text: Jason Bradley DeFord (born December 4, 1984 in Nashville, Tennessee; stage name is Jelly Roll) is an American country and pop music singer and recording artist. His songs include "Son of a Sinner" and "Need a Favor". For "Son of a Sinner," he won three CMT Music New Artist Awards. During the 66th Annual Grammy Awards, DeFord was nominated for 2022 Best New Artist. ==References== Category:American country singers Category:Singers from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Country musicians from Tennessee Category:Living people Category:1984 births
title: Jelly Roll (singer)
